articles.title: Singapore records 3 new Covid-19 deaths and 3577 new cases - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): Three seniors aged between 68 and 102 are the latest to die from complications linked to Covid-19, the Ministry of Health (MOH) said on Wednesday (Oct 6).
